item.title: Looking for an editor for my masculinity themed YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am looking for a professional to create / edit one YouTube video about masculinity.

The length of the video should be between 8-10 minutes long and pay $23 dollar per video.

I will provide the script and voice over. (You will not have to do any research regarding the video topic for the video, you will have to find clips/photos/background music/etc to create the video).

I am are looking for someone who:

- Has experience/work in creating social media video content, especially YouTube videos.
- Has experience using video editing softwares such as Adobe Premiere Pro
- Fluent in English
- Able to work within the deadline (24 hours)
- The style should adhere to our brand guidelines.

However, you can be very creative to make the video entertaining and engaging.

If you have read the middle of this job description, please type your favorite public male figure active today at the beginning or end of your proposal.

Video example:
https://youtu.be/eKmoYmJgqoY
https://youtu.be/trT1Aoyu6So

Also, if you’ve ever made a YouTube Cash Cow video in the masculinity niche, please attach samples of your work.

I look forward to hopefully working with you!

Budget: $23
Posted On: June 17, 2024 19:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Indonesia
click to apply

item.title: Talking Head Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone to help me edit some youtube videos for a client pretty quickly

Here's the style of video I'm looking to replicate. And when I say replicate I basically want you to apply the same style for a few different videos that are about 10 minutes long.

I'm looking to get about 50$-75$ per video and I'll have 3-6 videos like this that I'll need edited over the next few weeks

I'm looking for a quick turnaround time and bonus if you can make thumbnails/ edit short form content

Here's the example video: (https://www.youtube.com/@guardianduediligence)

please make sure to leave your turnaround time and price for a video with this exact style of editing

FYI: don't apply if you don't have loads of talking head video in your portfolio

Budget: $350

item.title: Creative Explainer Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Creative Explainer Video Creator Wanted!!!

PORTFOLIO IS A MUST!!!

We're searching for a creative and tech-savvy Explainer Video Creator to join our team. Your role will involve crafting engaging and informative videos that break down complex ideas into simple, easy-to-understand visuals and narratives. Ideal candidates will have a strong background in graphic design, animation, and video editing, with a knack for storytelling and a keen eye for detail. If you're passionate about turning information into captivating visual stories and have experience with video production tools, we'd love to see your work.

This project requires you to work with zoom screen sharing.  If you are not ok with working with zoom screen sharing, please do not apply.

Work Hours 11:00AM to 4:00PM PST (Los Angeles Time) Monday-Friday (Weekend Optional)

Hourly Range: $3.00

Category: Video Production

item.title: Social Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented Social Media Video Editor to join our team. As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for creating and editing engaging video content for our social media platforms. You will work closely with our marketing team to produce high-quality videos that align with our brand's message and objectives. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of social media trends and platforms, as well as experience with video editing software. If you have a creative mindset, attention to detail, and a passion for storytelling through video, we would love to hear from you.

Responsibilities:

- Edit and enhance video footage to create visually appealing content
- Collaborate with the marketing team to understand video requirements
- Trim, merge, and add effects to videos
- Ensure videos are optimized for different social media platforms
- Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a Video Editor
- Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
- Strong understanding of social media platforms
- Excellent attention to detail
- Creative mindset
- Strong organizational and time management skills


Posted On: June 17, 2024 18:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Content Manager - Part-Time - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a social content media master with a passion for creating buzz-worthy content? Do you thrive in a fast-paced environment where creativity and analytics go hand-in-hand? If so, we have the perfect role for you! We're on the hunt for a dynamic and driven Social Media Manager to join our team and elevate our social media presence to new heights.

What You'll Do...
Be the Voice: Craft and schedule captivating posts across LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and Google My Business.
Repurpose Genius: Transform our blog and podcast content into engaging, shareable social media posts.
Video: Clip long-form videos into high-quality short-form content that grabs attention and drives engagement.
Autonomous Leader: Take charge of our social media strategy and implementation with minimal guidance. We set the goals, and you bring them to life.
Engagement Enthusiast: Create content that resonates, engages, and sparks conversations.
Analytics Aficionado: Use data to refine and perfect our social media efforts, continuously improving KPIs.

What We're Looking For...
Experience: At least 5 years of hands-on social media management experience.
Creativity & Strategy: A proven track record of creating high-quality content and managing multi-platform strategies.
Video Editing Skills: Proficiency in turning long-form content into snappy, engaging short videos.
Independence: A self-starter who can hit the ground running without needing step-by-step instructions.
Passion for Engagement: Someone who loves putting out content that sparks interaction, not just clicks.
Data-Driven: An analytical mind that uses insights to drive improvements and results.
Tool Savvy: Familiar with top social media management tools like Agorapulse, Buffer, Metricool, and Sprout Social.


Social Media Tools:
You can use the social media platform you are most comfortable with like Agorapulse, Buffer, Metricool or Sprout Social

Why You'll Love Working With Us...
Innovative Environment: Be part of a forward-thinking team that values creativity and innovation.
Flexible Work: Enjoy the freedom of a remote position with flexible hours that fit your lifestyle.
Impactful Role: Your work will directly influence our brand's voice and engagement, making a real difference.
Growth Opportunities: We believe in continuous learning and improvement, and we'll support your growth as a social media professional.
Fun & Dynamic Team: Join a team that values collaboration, creativity, and having fun while we work hard.


How to Apply:
If you're ready to take our social media game to the next level and have a blast doing it, we want to hear from you! Send your proposal and message detailing why you're the perfect fit, and examples of your most engaging work.

Join us and become the driving force behind our social media success. We can't wait to see what you'll bring to the table!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 18:44 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Health & Wellness, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Video Editing & Production, Social Media Content, Marketing Strategy
Skills: Health & Wellness, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Video Editing & Production, Social Media Content, Marketing Strategy
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor / Animation Expert To Create Youtube & Tiktok "SHORTS" - Upwork
item.description:
Hi There,

I'm looking for someone with professional video editing experience to help produce videos for my "Viral Video" Youtube channel ((Tiktok, IG reels and Youtube shorts ) )

Your job will be to combine Youtube clips, use animations, sound effects, background music to transform and viral video I find online + a voice over I make to a extremely engaging 25-50 second short.  

You should also be able to do VFX and create animation and skilled a sound effect/ music. I'm going to provide you with a full written script and links to clips we want to use.

Here's examples of other channels finished products:

Style 1: "@ZackDFilms" (check youtube)

^^this style involves COMPLETELY animated CGI shorts

Style 2: "@NoxJackson" (check youtube)

^^ this style involves combining graphics, music and text

Please only apply if you can do 1 or both of these at the same level or better.

If you resume looks good we will start with a TEST project and if you pass we can start working together ASAP.

Thanks!

Hourly Range: $20.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 18:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Photo Editing, Video Production, Final Cut Pro, Adobe Photoshop, YouTube

item.title: Adobe after effects help - Upwork
item.description:
I am having difficulties with adobe after effects on Mac it’s a 8gb and I’m not sure if it’s hot enough ram to do what I want it to do .I basically want to assess if I can be shown how to remove items from my videos and change colours of for example my t shirt or background. I am getting an error saying 3d won’t be available and at my first attempt at removing my necklace from the video by layers and using the G pen it was a fail.

What I want to help is learning how to layer and use it a mask around what I want to remove from the video and change colour aspects.

My laptop is at 60% analysing to do the content aware fill and has been for hours this is my 2nd attempt the 1st attempt failed.

I am having difficulties with adobe after effects on Mac it’s a 8gb and I’m not sure if it’s hot enough ram to do what I want it to do .I basically want to assess if I can be shown how to remove items from my videos and change colours of for example my t shirt or background. I am getting an error saying 3d won’t be available and at my first attempt at removing my necklace from the video by layers and using the G pen it was a fail.

What I want to help is learning how to layer and use it a mask around what I want to remove from the video and change colour aspects

Hourly Range: $10.00

item.title: Russian and English speaking UGC content creator for promoting apps - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Content Creator who speaks fluent Russian and English. In this role, you will be responsible for producing 1-4 engaging and culturally relevant user-generated content (UGC) for our app. You will have the opportunity to showcase your creativity and linguistic skills while contributing to the growth and success of our platform.

Responsibilities:
- Create compelling UGC in Russian that resonates with our target audience.
- Generate innovative ideas for game-related content, including gameplay tutorials, tips and tricks, challenges, and more.
- Collaborate with our content team to develop strategies for engaging our Japanese-speaking user base.

Requirements:
- Fluent proficiency in Russian and English, both written and spoken.
- Knowledge of popular gaming platforms and social media trends (TikTok, Instagram).
- Excellent communication and storytelling skills.
- Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment
- Ability to fully edit UGC content, including adding captions, implementing gameplay videos, etc.
- Prior experience in user generated content creation.

Usage rights:

- You grant us and our advertiser the right to use, distribute, and broadcast the video you have created across all digital channels including, but not limited to, social media, and digital advertising platforms.
- The rights mentioned above shall be granted for a period of one (1) year from the date you agree to these terms.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 17, 2024 18:23 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Social Media Video, Comedy, Humor, Video Commercial, Concept Video, Promotional Video, Short Video Ad, Ad Content Creation, Acting, Social Media Ad Campaign
Skills: Social Media Video, Comedy, Humor, Video Commercial, Concept Video, Promotional Video, Short Video Ad, Ad Content Creation, Acting, Social Media Ad Campaign
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Canva Creative Person Needed (ASAP) - Upwork
item.description:
Dear,

For our Dutch dropshipping business we are looking forward to hit 8 figures this year. Therefore we are looking for a highly developed Photo Editor with experience in Dropshipping in Shopify to be part of a new team in our organization. Your job will be to elevate our current photo’s and make some outstanding creatives in order to advertise on Facebook!


Please answer the following questions, if you are interested.

- Do you have experience working with Shopify?
- Do you have experience with Trello?
- Do you have experience in Canva?
- Do you have experience in Google Drive?
- Are you able to work structured, properly communicating in Slack?
- Can you work according to OUR strategy?
- Are you available for 4-6 hours a day, 5-6 days a week?


As a Photo Editor you have:

- Experience in Canva (Must)
- Good communication skills(Must!)
- Experience with shopify (Pre)
- Experience with working with workflows, video trainings
- Experience with workflows like trello, monday.com etc. (pre)
- Experience with different communication platforms (slack)

If you do not meet the requirements, do not apply. (thank you)

Your duties will be:

- Creating new creatives for all of our products (Multiple daily)
- Working in trello and communicating with your fellow team members
- Being aware of the process and making sure there are no delays.


* WORKFLOW IS PROVIDED THROUGH EVERY STEP OF THE PROCESS
* CAREER OPPORTUNITIES IN THE TEAM

If you think you are the right person for this job and you are able to contribute to our company, please respond to this post.

Best regards,

Gijs


Hourly Range: $3.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 18:23 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Clothing, Fashion & Beauty, Graphic Design, Canva, Infographic, Social Media Marketing, Virtual Assistance
Skills: Clothing, Fashion & Beauty, Graphic Design, Canva, Infographic, Social Media Marketing, Virtual Assistance
Country: NLD
click to apply
